definition: Anning District of Lanzhou City 蘭州市|兰州市[Lan2 zhou1 Shi4], Gansu/Anning City, to the west of Kunming 昆明[Kun1 ming2], Yunnan
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
Anning District of Lanzhou City 蘭州市|兰州市[Lan2 zhou1 Shi4], Gansu
Anning county level city in Kunming 昆明[Kun1 ming2], Yunnan

sentences.english: Health administers to peace of mind.
sentences.chinese: 健康有助于身心的安宁。

sentences.english: Playing music so loudly that it annoys neighbours is antisocial.
sentences.chinese: 大声放音乐骚扰四邻是破坏社会安宁。

sentences.english: Behind the wall you are calm and peaceful.
sentences.chinese: 你在墙后，保持了安宁和冷静。

sentences.english: That perverse guy has been nagging at me all day.
sentences.chinese: 那个故意与我作对的家伙让我终日不得安宁。

sentences.english: Please take me away, I believe its peace at the Paradise!
sentences.chinese: 请带我走吧，我相信天堂里定会有安宁。

sentences.english: The noise which mke by crs disturbs residents living on both side of the street ll dy nd ll night.
sentences.chinese: 它所产生的噪音使街道两旁的住民日夜不得安宁。

sentences.english: Man becomes great exactly in the degree in which he works for the welfare of his fellow-men.
sentences.chinese: 一个人是否伟大在于他为同胞安宁幸福所做的努力。

sentences.english: Thee Annin flag company makes most American flags.
sentences.chinese: 安宁国旗公司出产全美大部分的国旗。

sentences.english: Feel the calmness on a quite sunny day.
sentences.chinese: 在阳光灿烂的日子里，感受安宁。

sentences.english: Endue him with blessings, and send him your peace.
Who can live in poverty with peace of mind ?
sentences.chinese: 谁能在贫穷中保持心灵的安宁？

sentences.english: We want our children to live in a peaceful world.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望我们的孩子生活在安宁的世界里。

sentences.english: His behavior will make his parents turn in their grave.
sentences.chinese: 他的行为会令他死去的父母在九泉之下不得安宁的。

sentences.english: They disregard their own safety, to maintain the social peace.
sentences.chinese: 他们不顾自己的安危，维护着社会的安宁。

sentences.english: We never learn the joy and peace of free time to just be alive.
sentences.chinese: 我们从来领略不到空闲时间的快乐和安宁，只是活着。

sentences.english: A society paying too much respect to heroism can't be very peaceful.
sentences.chinese: 一个崇尚个人英雄主义的国家，社会必然是不安宁的。

definition: Anting township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
Heping district of Shenyang city 瀋陽市|沈阳市, Liaoning/Hoping township in Taichung county 臺中縣|台中县[Tai2 zhong1 xian4], Taiwan
to live in peace and work happily (idiom)
